Translations.Text: So is this a magic or you do not see
Enter (and burn in) it, it is the same to you whether you are patient or you are not patient, you are only penalized for what you used to do
Indeed those who control themselves are in gardens and in happiness
Enjoying because of what their Master gave them and that their Master protected them from punishment of the hellfire
Eat and drink joyfully because of what you were doing
Leaning on couches lined up in rows, and We marry them to appealing girls with beautiful eyes
And those who believed and their descendants who followed them in belief, We join their descendants with them and We do not reduce anything from their works. Every person is bound by what he did
And We help them with whatever fruit and meat they desire
They pass a cup to one another in there that there is nothing useless or sinful in it
And young male servants who are like hidden pearl go around them for (serving) them
And they turn to each other asking one another
they say: indeed we were afraid among our people in the past
but God favored upon us and protected us from the punishment of scorching wind
Indeed we used to call on Him in the past. Indeed He is the good, the merciful
So remind (them) that by your Masterâ€™s favor you are not a fortune-teller or a madman
Or do they say: a poet, we wait for his time of misfortune (his death)
Say: wait and I wait with you
